DOC.brief_summary: assess effect Heliox Noninvasive positive pressure ventilation decrease dyspnea improve physiologic respiratory measure patient previous exposure Sulfur Mustard gas .
DOC.brief_title: Helium : Oxygen Noninvasive Positive Pressure Ventilation Patients Exposed Sulfur Mustard
DOC.criteria: exposure sulfur mustard worsen dyspnea last 10 day respiratory rate > 25/min arterial pH < 7.35 PaCO2 > 50 mmHg PaO2 < 50 mmHg recent pneumothorax ( < 1 month ) severe respiratory failure hemodynamic instability forthcoming intubation FIO2 < 0.4 impaired consciousness absence patient cooperation facial lesion preclude NIPPV
